ability.Speed Boost: This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage at the end of each full turn.
ability.Combat Master: Each Speed stage boost increases Blaziken's 10% evasion.

Blaze Kick II.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and Blaziken can restore 1/2 the HP lost by the target. At 1/3 or less of its max HP, power becomes 1.5x.

Thunder Punch.effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

Swords Dance.effect: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.

Burning Bulwark.effect: The user is protected from attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, Pokemon making contact with the user become burned. Fails if the user uses this move last turn.
